subject: TMDP
title: Adv Theory/Prin TMD
info: Nature and pathophysiology of disorders causing chronic pain in TMJ and craniofacial regions; advanced principles and theory on assessment, diagnosis, and interdisciplinary management.

subject: TMDP
title: Seminar TMD & Orofacial Pain
info: Advanced topics on theories and application of recently developed techniques of data collection, diagnostic strategies, and management.

subject: TMDP
title: Adv Clin TMD & Orofacial Pain
info:
Interdisciplinary study of patients with TMD and orofacial pain using techniques of assessment currently being researched; background and clinical knowledge of patient synthesized with respect to current literature on management; management program is developed, discussed with faculty, and implemented.

prereq: Participation in TMJ and orofacial pain advanced education program

subject: TMDP
title: Seminar With focus on Pharm
info: Seminar Course offered with a focus on pharmacology for the TMD field

subject: TMDP
title: Seminar with focus on sleep
info: Seminar with a special focus on Dental Sleep Medicine

subject: TMDP
title: Seminar with focus on OFP
info: Seminar to present the most up to date literature and discussion to TMD residents
